system.effect: Can move through solid objects by burrowing, at a speed of X. Can burrow through soil, rock, sand, and so on. Some creatures can burrow through metal. Burrowing leaves behind a tunnel that creatures one size smaller can enter without impediment. Each round, there is a 50% chance the tunnel collapses behind the creature.
